content: द्रुत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [द्रु-क्त] {@--1@} Quick, swift, speedy. {@--2@} Flown, run away, escaped. {@--3@} Melted, liquid, dissolved. {@--4@} Scattered, diffused. {@--5@} Indistinct. {@--6@} Moved, softened; <ls>Māl. 5. 28</ls>; see द्रु. --तः {@--1@} A scorpion. {@--2@} A tree. {@--3@} A cat. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Quickly, swiftly, speedily, immediately.
